entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 17 with temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High minus 17 with temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
